sendSms

public SmsLog sendSms(SendSmsDTO params)
This methods runs a new transaction for handling the sms status, charging, etc... Then, the log is always persisted in another transaction (with a TransactionEndListener). So, even if the sending fails, the log is persisted

Specified by:
sendSms in interface MessageServiceLocal
